flawed_nl_solution:
Out of the first 100 balls, Ralph was able to hit 2/5 of them and not able to hit 3/5 of them, 3/5 x 100 = <<3/5*100=60>>60 tennis balls Ralph didn't hit.
Out of the next 75 balls, Ralph was able to hit 1/3 of them and not able to hit 2/3 of them, 2/3 x 75 = <<2/3*75=225/2>>225/2 tennis balls that Ralph didn't hit.
Combined, Ralph was not able to hit 60 + 225/2 = <<60+225/2=345/2>>345/2 tennis balls Ralph didn't hit.
#### 345/2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 225/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
